attributes.action: Make the road outside deepoint primary school safe with more road markings and more parking
attributes.additional_details: There is a complete blind spot outside the school of deepoint primary school in which there are always cars parked motorcyclists can therefore not see any oncoming cars,but cars can see them but still don't stop therefore due to the parked cars the vehicles involved in any possible collision won't have room to avoid it as it would be too late
